name: updateable-node-app
description: A lightweight and flexible Docker container for running Node.js applications with a web UI and command-line script for easy updates, version rollback, and environment management

scripts.dev: npx nodemon server.js -V --ignore deployments/* --ignore env-configs/* --ignore config.json --ignore __tests__ --ignore .upload_blacklist --ignore .upload_bearer --ignore persistent/* --ignore test/* --ignore uploads/* --ignore data/* --ignore tmp_code_*.bash --ignore tmp_code_*.*
